title: Epic 2: Client & Dog Management
description: Full CRUD for clients and dogs with Vue frontend pages. Includes search/filter, tabbed detail views, and photo upload for dog profiles.

title: Create ClientsController with Inertia responses
description: Implement ClientsController with index, show, new, create, edit, update, destroy (soft delete). Use Inertia for all responses. Include search/filter params for index.

title: Create Vue pages for clients management
description: Create pages/clients/: index.vue (list with search/filter, card/table toggle), show.vue (tabs: Overview, Dogs, Appointments, Invoices), new.vue, edit.vue. Include ClientCard.vue component.

title: Create DogsController nested under clients
description: Implement DogsController with shallow nesting under clients. Support photo upload via Active Storage. Include routes: clients/:client_id/dogs and dogs/:id.

title: Create Vue pages for dog profiles
description: Create pages/dogs/: show.vue (profile with photo, temperament, medical notes, report card history), edit.vue (form with photo upload). Include DogCard.vue and DogSelector.vue components.

title: Epic 9: Notifications, Real-time & Polish
description: ActionMailer for appointment reminders, ActionCable for live calendar updates, navigation updates, and mobile optimization.

title: Create AppointmentMailer for confirmations and reminders
description: Build app/mailers/appointment_mailer.rb with methods: confirmation, reminder, cancellation. Include appointment details, client/dog info. Design responsive email templates.

title: Create SendReminderJob for scheduled notifications
description: Build app/jobs/send_reminder_job.rb using Solid Queue. Schedule reminders 24h and 1h before appointments. Configure in config/recurring.yml. Handle timezone-aware scheduling.

title: Create AppointmentsChannel for real-time calendar updates
description: Build app/channels/appointments_channel.rb for ActionCable. Stream appointment changes to calendar. Implement frontend subscription in AppointmentCalendar.vue. Show toast on updates.

title: Update navigation, TypeScript types, and mobile polish
description: Update AppLayout.vue sidebar with: Clients, Dogs, Schedule, Invoices, Report Cards, Marketing. Add all TypeScript interfaces to types/index.d.ts. Ensure mobile-responsive layouts. Update PWA manifest.

title: Epic 7: Progress Report Cards
description: Report card system with score visualization (rings/gauges), media montage generation, and shareable public links via signed tokens.

title: Create ReportCardsController with shareable links
description: Implement ReportCardsController with CRUD actions. Generate share_token using generates_token_for for public access. Create public show action that doesn't require authentication.

title: Create report card Vue pages with score visualization
description: Create pages/report_cards/: show.vue (scores, notes, media), new.vue (score inputs, media selector), public.vue (shareable view without auth). Include ScoreRing.vue component for visual gauges.

title: Create MontageGenerator service for progress timelines
description: Build app/services/montage_generator.rb to compile featured session_media into a timeline. Order by date, include captions. Return structured data for MediaMontage.vue component.

title: Create share dialog and media montage Vue components
description: Build components: ShareDialog.vue (generate/copy link, set expiry), MediaMontage.vue (timeline of progress photos with dates). Add share button to report_cards/show.vue.

title: Epic 8: Marketing Content Creation
description: Transform training media into marketing content. Platform-specific formatting (FB, IG, TikTok), client media permissions, and content scheduling.

title: Create MediaConsentsController for permission management
description: Implement MediaConsentsController to manage client permissions for using dog media in marketing. Track marketing_allowed, internal_only flags. Add consent UI to client detail page.

title: Create MarketingContentsController for content management
description: Implement MarketingContentsController with CRUD. Support status transitions: draft → scheduled → published. Filter media by consent status. Associate content with session_media items.

title: Create ContentFormatter service for platform optimization
description: Build app/services/content_formatter.rb to format content for different platforms. Handle image sizing (FB: 1200x630, IG: 1080x1080, TikTok: 1080x1920). Generate platform-specific text limits.

title: Create marketing Vue pages with platform previews
description: Create pages/marketing/: index.vue (content calendar, status filters), new.vue (create from report card media), edit.vue (platform preview). Build components: PlatformPreview.vue, ContentScheduler.vue, ConsentBadge.vue.

title: Epic 3: Appointment Scheduling
description: Appointment CRUD with calendar views (month/week/day). Includes backend controller, calendar API endpoint, and Vue calendar component.

title: Create AppointmentsController with Inertia responses
description: Implement AppointmentsController with full CRUD. Include scopes: for_date_range, upcoming, by_status. Support filtering by client, dog, service_type, and date range.

title: Create calendar API endpoint for date range queries
description: Create Api::CalendarEventsController with index action. Accept start/end date params, return appointments as JSON events for calendar rendering. Include color-coding by status.

title: Create AppointmentCalendar.vue component
description: Build calendar component with month/week/day views. Use shadcn Calendar. Support click-to-create, click-to-view, and drag-to-reschedule (desktop). Color-code by appointment status.

title: Create appointment CRUD Vue pages
description: Create pages/appointments/: index.vue (calendar view), show.vue (details with linked report card), new.vue (booking form with service type selector, client/dog picker). Include AppointmentForm.vue and ServiceTypeSelector.vue components.

title: Epic 4: Group Classes & Recurring Appointments
description: Enrollment system for group classes with capacity limits and waitlists. Recurring appointment support with RRULE expansion.

title: Create EnrollmentsController for group class management
description: Implement EnrollmentsController for joining/leaving group classes. Handle capacity limits, waitlist additions, and cancellations. Nested under appointments.

title: Create WaitlistProcessor service for auto-promotion
description: Build app/services/waitlist_processor.rb to auto-promote waitlisted enrollments when spots open. Trigger on cancellation or capacity increase. Send notification to promoted clients.

title: Create RecurringAppointmentGenerator service
description: Build app/services/recurring_appointment_generator.rb to expand RRULE patterns into appointment instances. Support daily, weekly, monthly recurrence. Handle series_id for bulk operations.

title: Create group class and recurrence Vue components
description: Build components: EnrollmentManager.vue (add/remove participants), WaitlistDisplay.vue (show position), RecurrenceSelector.vue (daily/weekly/monthly options). Enhance appointments/show.vue with enrollment list for groups.

title: Epic 5: Invoicing & Accounting
description: Invoice management with line items, status transitions (draft→sent→paid), and QuickBooks export capability.

title: Create InvoicesController with status transitions
description: Implement InvoicesController with full CRUD. Include member actions: send_to_client, mark_paid. Handle status transitions: draft → sent → paid/overdue. Calculate totals from line items.

title: Create invoice line items management
description: Implement nested InvoiceLineItemsController or handle via accepts_nested_attributes. Support dynamic add/remove of line items in invoice form. Auto-link appointments to line items.

title: Create invoice Vue pages with line item management
description: Create pages/invoices/: index.vue (filter by status, sort by date/amount), show.vue (line items, print view, payment actions), new.vue (dynamic line item management). Include InvoiceLineItemRow.vue and InvoiceStatusBadge.vue components.

title: Create QuickBooks export service
description: Build app/services/quickbooks_exporter.rb to export invoices in CSV or IIF format compatible with QuickBooks. Include customer mapping, line item details, and payment status. Add export button to invoices index.

title: Epic 1: Data Layer Foundation
description: Create all database migrations, Rails models with validations/associations/scopes, and comprehensive seed data. This is the foundation that all other features depend on.

title: Create database migrations for all entities
description: Create migrations for: clients, dogs, service_types, appointments, enrollments, invoices, invoice_line_items, session_media, report_cards, media_consents, marketing_contents. Include proper indexes and foreign keys.

title: Create Rails models with validations and associations
description: Create models: Client, Dog, ServiceType, Appointment, Enrollment, Invoice, InvoiceLineItem, SessionMedia, ReportCard, MediaConsent, MarketingContent. Include validations, associations, scopes, and status enums.

title: Create comprehensive seed data
description: Create db/seeds.rb with: 5 clients, 10+ dogs, 3 service types, 20 appointments across statuses, 5 invoices in various states, 10 report cards with realistic scores, sample media consents.

title: Epic 6: Media Management
description: Active Storage setup for photo/video uploads during training sessions. Includes upload UI, gallery view, and background processing for thumbnails/transcoding.

title: Configure Active Storage for media uploads
description: Set up Active Storage for image and video uploads. Configure storage service (local dev, S3 prod). Add has_one_attached to Dog and has_many_attached to SessionMedia. Set file size and type validations.

title: Create SessionMediaController for upload and tagging
description: Implement SessionMediaController with create, update, destroy. Support direct upload from frontend. Handle tagging media to dogs and appointments. Mark media as featured.

title: Create media upload Vue components
description: Build components: MediaUploader.vue (drag-drop with progress), MediaGallery.vue (grid with lightbox), MediaTagger.vue (tag to dog, mark featured). Integrate upload into appointments/show.vue.

title: Create ProcessMediaJob for thumbnails and transcoding
description: Build app/jobs/process_media_job.rb using Solid Queue. Generate thumbnails for images using ImageMagick/vips. Transcode videos to web-friendly formats. Store variants in Active Storage.
